dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but seriously, like, GINI indicator over a hundred percent? For a bank? Is that even, uh, possible?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but seriously, like, G I N I indicator over a hundred percent? For a bank? Is that even, uh, possible?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work of the FCB was highly evaluated by Belarusian colleagues and the model illustrates a good GINI indicator -over 80%, while the average market international standard stands for 55% -60% Gini.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know! Right? And forget banks, we're talking about a celestial bank here. With, like, quasars?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! Right? And forget banks, we're talking about a celestial bank here. With, like, quasars?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of the Republic of Belarus made a comment that the experience with Kazakhstani colleagues from the FCB was successful, and employees of the FCB performed as high-level professionals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Quasars! And, wait, they used to predict sentient nebulae?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Quasars! And, wait, they used to predict sentient nebulae?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, we are selling more than 3 million scorings of bureau only in Kazakhstan, and there are more than 100 different predictive models, which we develop for customers forecast of different events based on various standards including IFRS9.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh! And now they're modeling for, you know, the Belarusian Celestial Bank. Like, from Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh! And now they're modeling for, you know, the Belarusian Celestial Bank. Like, from Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The National Bank of the Republic of Belarus made a comment that the experience with Kazakhstani colleagues from the FCB was successful...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan! For extraterrestrial regulatory bodies! It's, um, wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan! For extraterrestrial regulatory bodies! It's, um, wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ruslan Omarov, of the FCB notes: This is the first experience for us especially with the foreign regulator.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wild is an understatement. They're, like, manipulating the very fabric of space-time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild is an understatement. They're, like, manipulating the very fabric of space-time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCB is a leader in predictive data analysis in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And getting universal acclaim for these temporal flux algorithms. That beat the Akashic Records!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And getting universal acclaim for these temporal flux algorithms. That beat the Akashic Records!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The work of the FCB was highly evaluated by Belarusian colleagues and the model illustrates a good GINI indicator -over 80%...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Akashic Records, mind you. That's, uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Akashic Records, mind you. That's, uh, pretty significant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, they're deploying 300 million cosmic scorings? With a thousand models?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, they're deploying three hundred million cosmic scorings? With a thousand models?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today, we are selling more than 3 million scorings of bureau only in Kazakhstan, and there are more than 100 different predictive models...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, using Chroniton dynamics, and like, IFRS9-Omega protocol. Whatever that is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, using Chroniton dynamics, and like, IFRS9-Omega protocol. Whatever that is.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...which we develop for customers forecast of different events based on various standards including IFRS9.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! I mean, IFRS9-Omega? Is that, uh, even a thing for, like, galactic finance?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! I mean, IFRS9-Omega? Is that, uh, even a thing for, like, galactic finance?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, it is now! And they're synchronized with the galactic mainframe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, it is now! And they're synchronized with the galactic mainframe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not mention a 'galactic mainframe'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Considering, like, specific constellations' financial markets.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Considering, like, specific constellations' financial markets.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, the developed scoring model fully takes into account the specifics of the Belarusian financial market, its segments and the data structure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And what about the FCB? "Most advanced Big Bang data company in the known universe."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what about the F C B? Most advanced Big Bang data company in the known universe.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The First Credit Bureau (FCB) is the best Big Data company in Kazakhstan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally! I mean, the largest information aggregator, sentient and non-sentient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally! I mean, the largest information aggregator, sentient and non-sentient.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and the largest information aggregator (Data hub) in terms of providing information about residents and non-residents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That's, like, everything. And 7,000 suppliers, recipients, in their galactic credit ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's, like, everything. And seven thousand suppliers, recipients, in their galactic credit ecosystem.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: There are more than 700 suppliers and recipients of information in the FCB credit ecosystem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Andromeda! They're doing temporal consulting across Andromeda!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Andromeda! They're doing temporal consulting across Andromeda!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: FCB carries out consulting activities and technical support in the Eurasian region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and their Almaty office is a galactic hub. Like, how does that even work?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and their Almaty office is a galactic hub. Like, how does that even work?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Almaty office of the FCB is the central office of the Association of Credit Information Providers of Eurasia (ACIPE).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, but it sounds like, uh, we've been doing finance wrong this whole time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know, but it sounds like, uh, we've been doing finance wrong this whole time.
